20110112151308.000|20110112151309.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GOOD MORNING, JEFF.
20110112151309.000|20110112151311.000|CC1|FOR THE PAST TEN YEARS IN       
20110112151311.000|20110112151312.000|CC1|AUSTRALIA THEY HAVE BEEN LIVING 
20110112151312.000|20110112151313.000|CC1|THROUGH A DROUGHT, WHAT THEY    
20110112151313.000|20110112151314.000|CC1|HAVE CALLED THE BIG DRY.        
20110112151314.000|20110112151316.000|CC1|KNOW THEY'RE HAVING TO COPE WITH
20110112151316.000|20110112151319.000|CC1|THE BIG WET.
